original: Abyākataṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: abyākatam parittam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
